title: How does the LiDAR scanner on an iPhone 12 work? - Quora

response.answer_text: We are yet not completely sure whether iPhone 12 will have a LiDAR sensor, it’s more likely to be present in the PRO versions only. Coming to the working, it will able to determine the distance of surfaces around and better understand the depth layout. It’s already implemented on the iPad Pro 2020 and is also present in Tesla cars.

How does the LiDAR scanner on an iPhone 12 work? I guess you’ll have to go work for Apple as an engineer to find out since the iPhone 12 technically doesn’t exist in the world yet outside of Apple’s environment. Can your next question be something like “how does the average person pilot a flying car?”
